content.p: Now is the time to think about finding the career that's right for you but with so many opportunities out there, we know it can be hard to plan for the future. That's why we're here to help. We have new graduate events coming up this autumn and give practical alumni tips and advice in our monthly enewsletters - so don't worry, there is lots of support on offer to help you get ahead. Now you're part of our alumni community, you can continue to take advantage of our free careers service. The following can be done after your graduation: Join us on LinkedIn and start networking today. For full details of careers support available to you as a recent graduate visit the Careers and Employability Service page. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8373 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8657 email: alumnirelations@nottingham.edu.my
